 2024-11642024-11-01VAC
ActVeterans Review and Appeal Board Act
PrecisAppointment of DEREK GRANT of Milton, Ontario, to be a temporary member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective January 16, 2025.
